steps.name: Verify client notes can be change from UI
check via api that the simple client has been created
search a new client by phone number
assert - search returns one customer in UI

parameters.name: data
parameters.value: ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=oZxWy1IkbV, permitAds=true, birthdate=12-24, birthyear=1979, address=Apt. 295 931 Kelly Rue, Williamsontown, FL 33575, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-01 17:29:44","desc":"1bPCm7l9SJ","sum":859424112}], phone=["0503-68-58-41"], email=hoa.hermann@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-01 17:29:44","text":"j2dneYiWOE"}], name=Emmanuel Corwin, gender=null)

steps.name: search client by new phone number via api
assert via api that the client notes has been updated by comparing name and address

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=oZxWy1IkbV, permitAds=true, birthdate=12-24, birthyear=1979, address=Apt. 295 931 Kelly Rue, Williamsontown, FL 33575, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-01 17:29:44","desc":"1bPCm7l9SJ","sum":859424112}], phone=["0503-68-58-41"], email=hoa.hermann@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-01 17:29:44","text":"j2dneYiWOE"}], name=Emmanuel Corwin, gender=null)'

usingRecursiveComparison '- no overridden equals methods were used in the comparison (except for java types)
- these types were compared with the following comparators:
  - java.lang.Double -> DoubleComparator[precision=1.0E-15]
  - java.lang.Float -> FloatComparator[precision=1.0E-6]
  - java.nio.file.Path -> lexicographic comparator (Path natural order)
- actual and expected objects and their fields were compared field by field recursively even if they were not of the same type, this allows for example to compare a Person to a PersonDto (call strictTypeChecking(true) to change that behavior).
'

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=oZxWy1IkbV, permitAds=true, birthdate=12-24, birthyear=1979, address=Apt. 295 931 Kelly Rue, Williamsontown, FL 33575, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-01 17:29:44","desc":"1bPCm7l9SJ","sum":859424112}], phone=["0503-68-58-41"], email=hoa.hermann@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-01 17:29:44","text":"j2dneYiWOE"}], name=Emmanuel Corwin, gender=null)'

isEqualTo 'ClientGetResponse(id=3209, name=Emmanuel Corwin, phone=0503685841, profileImage=Hat 5.svg, address=Apt. 295 931 Kelly Rue, Williamsontown, FL 33575, status=oZxWy1IkbV, permitAds=false, isUnsubscribed=false, lastAppointment=null, phoneCanonical=+972503685841)'
